Random WKT point

Random WKT point

wkt_point(count = 1, bbox = NULL, fmt = 7)

Arguments

count
(integer/numeric) number of points. Default: 1
bbox
(integer/numeric) lat/long bounding box from which to generate positions; numeric vector of the form west (long), south (lat), east (long), north (lat). optional
fmt
(integer/numeric) number of digits. Default: 7

Value

WKT; a character vector with one ore more POINT strings

Examples

wkt_point()
#> [1] "POINT (169.5042089 -4.0389827)"
wkt_point(10)
#>  [1] "POINT (-120.0633236 62.0856857)"  "POINT (-14.7099532 -14.2171553)" 
#>  [3] "POINT (34.1349125 -29.0804018)"   "POINT (8.7408484 0.3638020)"     
#>  [5] "POINT (-174.7012310 -66.3250514)" "POINT (-16.8878754 -74.3789490)" 
#>  [7] "POINT (16.0938598 16.2551435)"    "POINT (1.1325976 58.2914554)"    
#>  [9] "POINT (169.1250805 -17.2776626)"  "POINT (174.4435680 -4.1441787)"  
wkt_point(100)

wkt_point(fmt = 5)
#> [1] "POINT (-65.21471 -14.24815)"
wkt_point(fmt = 6)
#> [1] "POINT (-19.080925 -24.619290)"
wkt_point(fmt = 7)
#> [1] "POINT (140.4104400 52.3153176)"

wkt_point(bbox = c(50, 50, 60, 60))
#> [1] "POINT (56.3041172 58.2317218)"
